attributes.action: Stop the drain on the NHS and Benefit welfare to imigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Prevent free healthcare being given to people who have not lived, worked and paid taxes, excluding residents by birth, in the UK for a minimum of two years.
2. Prevent our taxes and council housing being given to those who have not lived, worked and paid taxes, excluding residents by birth, in the UK for a minimum of two years.
3. Adopt a similar policy to other EU countries who return immigrants to whence they came and stop being the European sinkhole for immigrants.  
4.The Geneva convention regarding immigration should be enforced and asylum seekers should seek asylum in the country whose borders they first cross into, i.e. a neighbouring country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
